amendment.description: Page 3, line 9, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $10,000,000)".***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management, and increase funds for the state and local divisions of FEMA.

action.text: Mr. Aderholt raised a point of order against the McCaul amendment (A010). Mr. Aderholt stated that the amendment seeks to amend portions of the bill not yet read for consideration. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. McCaul.
